# 28 Free Ebooks and Courses for Web Developers

## Free HTML, CSS Ebooks

1. https://learn.shayhowe.com/html-css/
2. https://goalkicker.com/HTML5Book/
3. https://www.htmldog.com/
4. https://cssanimation.rocks/
5. https://leanpub.com/web-visual-effects-with-css3/read
6. https://adamschwartz.co/magic-of-css/chapters/1-the-box/
7. https://www.internetingishard.com/html-and-css/
8. http://diveintohtml5.info/index.html
9. https://dash.generalassemb.ly/
10. https://maintainablecss.com/
11. https://marksheet.io/
12. https://ecss.benfrain.com/
13. https://joshondesign.com/p/books/canvasdeepdive/toc.html
14. https://codeguide.co/#html-doctype
15. https://html5hive.org/free-ebook-a-guide-to-html5-and-css3/
16. https://ohansemmanuel.github.io/uf_download.html

25. https://web-engineering.info/JsFrontendApp-Book
26. http://read.humanjavascript.com/ch02-the-big-decision.html
27. https://www.learn-js.org/
